summary: This bill, the Gas-Operated Semi-Automatic Firearms Exclusion Act (GOSAFE Act), amends Title 18 of the United States Code to restrict the possession, sale, manufacture, and transfer of certain gas-operated semi-automatic firearms and large capacity ammunition feeding devices. It defines these terms, outlines exemptions, and establishes penalties for violations. The bill also directs the Attorney General to create and maintain a list of prohibited firearms and allows for manufacturer applications and appeals regarding firearm designs. Additionally, it allocates Byrne grants for buy-back programs and creates a Firearm Safety Trust Fund.
